title: Roughly 1 Hour 25 Minutes left until Pool Party ends.
body: Join the 'Pool Party' chat room and spam a few Normal and/or ARAM games and see if we get get a final burst of points before it ends. The chat room always has at least ~100 people there, many of whom are willing to spam games with any team they can put together.

replies.body: We also get summoner icons and for the facebook thingy mystery champion
what for? Pool party minions? LOL? get fked Riot.
